command_group: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule create
commands.summary: Create a network manager security configuration admin rule.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule create --access {Allow, AlwaysAllow, Deny}
                                                                     --configuration-name
                                                                     --direction {Inbound, Outbound}
                                                                     --name
                                                                     --priority
                                                                     --protocol {Ah, Any, Esp, Icmp, Tcp, Udp}
                                                                     --resource-group
                                                                     --rule-collection-name
                                                                     --rule-name
                                                                     [--description]
                                                                     [--dest-port-ranges]
                                                                     [--destinations]
                                                                     [--flag]
                                                                     [--kind {Custom, Default}]
                                                                     [--source-port-ranges]
                                                                     [--sources]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule create --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --rule-collection-name "myTestCollection" --rule-name "SampleAdminRule" --kind "Custom" --protocol "Tcp" --access "Allow" --priority 32 --direction "Inbound" --destinations address-prefix="*" address-prefix-type="IPPrefix"  --dest-port-ranges 22

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule delete
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule delete [--config]
                                                                     [--force {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                     [--ids]
                                                                     [--name]
                                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                     [--rc]
                                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                                     [--rule-name]
                                                                     [--subscription]
                                                                     [--yes]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule delete --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --rule-collection-name "myTestCollection" --rule-name "SampleAdminRule"

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule list
commands.summary: List all network manager security configuration admin rules.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule list --config
                                                                   --name
                                                                   --rc
                                                                   --resource-group
                                                                   [--max-items]
                                                                   [--next-token]
                                                                   [--skip-token]
                                                                   [--top]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule list --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --rule-collection-name "myTestCollection"

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule show
commands.summary: Get a network manager security configuration admin rule.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule show [--config]
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--name]
                                                                   [--rc]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--rule-name]
                                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule show --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --rule-collection-name "myTestCollection" --rule-name "SampleAdminRule"

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule update
commands.summary: Update a network manager security configuration admin rule in a subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule update --rule-collection-name
                                                                     [--access {Allow, AlwaysAllow, Deny}]
                                                                     [--configuration-name]
                                                                     [--description]
                                                                     [--dest-port-ranges]
                                                                     [--destinations]
                                                                     [--direction {Inbound, Outbound}]
                                                                     [--flag]
                                                                     [--ids]
                                                                     [--kind {Custom, Default}]
                                                                     [--name]
                                                                     [--priority]
                                                                     [--protocol {Ah, Any, Esp, Icmp, Tcp, Udp}]
                                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                                     [--rule-name]
                                                                     [--source-port-ranges]
                                                                     [--sources]
                                                                     [--subscription]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config rule-collection rule update --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --rule-collection-name "myTestCollection" --rule-name "SampleAdminRule" --access "Deny"
